item.title: Pet O Pair
item.description: This was a project I helped build with some colleagues in my Bootcamp. I took the lead on the JavaScript file and also contributed a small amount of time to building the necessary HTML.

item.title: Know your Rep, Do your Prep
item.description: This is the first project I built with a few colleagues of mine in our Bootcamp. I took lead on writing our JavaScript while offering minor input on how we consumed API’s.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m a Full-Stack developer originally from Dallas, Texas! I am currently living in Seattle, Washington. Me and my little girl Belle on the way back from swimming I’ve been fascinated by technology and computers since I got my first PC to share with my brother and sister. I currently work mostly in front-end web development and specialize in JavaScript and some of it’s associated libraries like Node and Angular, as well as effective templating tools like TypeScript.
